body:
Is this a BUG REPORT or FEATURE REQUEST?:

/kind feature

What happened:

When trying to list object using field spec.ServiceAccountName, we are getting the below error message.

field label not supported: spec.serviceAccountName

What you expected to happen:

To be able to fetch pods using the list and watch based on the field 'spec.serviceAccountName'

How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible):

in minikube run
```
kubectl get pods -n kube-system --field-selector spec.serviceAccountName=storage-provisioner
```

Anything else we need to know?:

Description:

Unable to fetch pods based on the field 'spec.serviceAccountName'.

When trying to get an overview of RBAC privileges in a cluster it is hard to find the objects attached to service accounts

**Environment**:
- Kubernetes version (use `kubectl version`):
Client Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"11", GitVersion:"v1.11.0", GitCommit:"91e7b4fd31fcd3d5f436da26c980becec37ceefe", GitTreeState:"clean", BuildDate:"2018-06-27T20:17:28Z", GoVersion:"go1.10.2", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"linux/amd64"}
Server Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"11", GitVersion:"v1.11.0", GitCommit:"91e7b4fd31fcd3d5f436da26c980becec37ceefe", GitTreeState:"clean", BuildDate:"2018-06-27T20:08:34Z", GoVersion:"go1.10.2", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"linux/amd64"}
- Cloud provider or hardware configuration: minikube version: v0.28.0
- OS (e.g. from /etc/os-release): NAME=Buildroot
VERSION=2018.05
ID=buildroot
VERSION_ID=2018.05
PRETTY_NAME="Buildroot 2018.05"
- Kernel (e.g. `uname -a`): Linux minikube 4.16.14 #1 SMP Mon Jun 11 16:20:15 UTC 2018 x86_64 GNU/Linux
- Install tools: kubeadm
- Others:

labels.name: kind/feature

title: field label spec.serviceAccountName not supported
